alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 17 at 8:20PM EST until January 20 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River at Abbeville affecting Telfair, Wilcox and Dodge Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Juliette, Griffin, Juliette, Macon, Dames Ferry, Macon, Clinchfield, Hawkinsville, Hawkinsville, Byron, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding will continue. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River at Abbeville. * WHEN...Until late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 14 feet, Moderate flooding begins. Roads to homes along the west side of the river in Abbeville become inaccessible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 14 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM EST Wednesday was 14.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Saturday afternoon and continue falling to 10 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 1100 AM EST.
